short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tengen Uzui wields his chained dual swords as vibrant fireworks light up the sky in the background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embrace the power and flair of Tengen Uzui with this dynamic and explosive theme.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Tengen Uzui holding his dual swords connected by chains, with a backdrop of vibrant fireworks, reflecting his flamboyant and powerful personality.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a stylish display that matches the excitement and boldness of Tengen Uzui’s presence.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Easily access your favorite websites, embodying the speed and precision of Tengen’s fighting style.
🎮 Play Games: Engage in action-packed mini-games inspired by Tengen’s explosive combat style and his larger-than-life personality.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform quick and efficient searches with the same flair and confidence as Tengen Uzui.
🚀 More Extensions: Add features that complement your browsing experience with Tengen’s vibrant and powerful energy.
